Lyrics animation

Animated lyric video for the song "I'M OK" by Little Big. The lyrics are designed based on visual research.

Description

Lyric video for the first minute of Little Big's song 'I'm Okay', where the design matches the feel of the song.

To explore working with Procreate and gaining some illustration-skills, every frame is hand-drawn.
